snippet: An area on the Île Seguin will be among the sites for FIAC, the mid-October Paris art fair. The space, called R4, will eventually become a Jean Nouvel-designed complex. It is only one of several new art spaces on the Paris periphery.
abstract: An area on the Île Seguin will be among the sites for FIAC, the mid-October Paris art fair. The space, called R4, will eventually become a Jean Nouvel-designed complex. It is only one of several new art spaces on the Paris periphery.

headline.main: Big Spaces for Big Art at the Edges of Paris
